file_content.text: It's been... interesting traveling with you.
Welcome back to the ship.
Captain Orzik here. I understand you're on your way back--I assume congratulations are in order.
Our marines have been recalled to the Black Talon. As soon as you're aboard, we'll jump to lightspeed--Republic reinforcements could arrive any minute.
Prepare a holding cell. I'm bringing a prisoner.
I have a captive.
The general? I'm sure the droid and Grand Moff Kilran will be pleased to have him alive.
I'm finished here--the general has been dealt with.
The job's done.
I'm sure Grand Moff Kilran will be delighted. Even I have to admit I'm glad he's out of Republic hands.
Noted.
Let them come. We'll defeat them just as we defeated this ship.
More to kill.
We're barely surviving against the Brentaal Star--it's still got fighters out here. I don't want to press our luck.
I'll see you on the bridge. Congratulations again--Orzik out.
Good luck on the Brentaal Star.
There's not much I can do from here. You'll need to repel our boarders yourself.
Yes? What is it, then?
This is the captain. If you can hear this, we need you on the bridge.
Captain Orzik to shuttle bay. Scanners show no more gunships.
We're still tracking one boarding party, though--tech specialists heading for the shield generators.
We've trapped them in the cargo hold, but they could escape any minute. I recommend you pursue.
Unfortunately, I have some bad news. Now that the general has been dealt with, I've decided to leave--without you.
Why? You agreed to cooperate!
What?
I should've expected as much.
Of course you have.
Bad move.
I am sorry, but I don't trust you with the safety of my crew--I can't.
We've disabled Kilran's droid, and the Grand Moff will assume you died in the fighting.
So long as the general's gone, Kilran will be satisfied. My people are taken care of.
You can't escape. I'll claw through the Black Talon's hull if I have to.
I'll get on board somehow.
It doesn't have to be this way, Captain. Let me back on board.
We can settle this.
I wish it were that easy. But you hijacked my ship, and I just don't believe you.
I'm going to do horrible things to you, Captain. Count on it.
Be afraid of me.
If you're captured by the Republic, I hope they treat you well.
This is Captain Orzik to all Imperial marines--return to the Black Talon immediately. We are now counting down to lightspeed.
